name: Art
description:
A game I made in a single class period at school because I was bored out of my mind. I actually freaked myself out making this, so I hope I have accomplished the "Horror" aspect of the game.

Made with Bitsy.

Want to support me making games but don't want to donate? Just click this link. It redirects you to an adfly link and I get a small portion of money from you clicking on it. Thanks! http://atominik.com/1bft
